/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.data.Store', {
        storeId: 'simpsonsStore',
        fields: ['name'],
        data: [
            ["Lisa"],
            ["Bart"],
            ["Homer"],
            ["Marge"]
        ],
        proxy: {
            type: 'memory',
            reader: 'array'
        }
    });

    Ext.create('Ext.grid.Panel', {
        store: 'simpsonsStore',
        columns: [{
            header: 'Name',
            dataIndex: 'name',
            flex: true
        }],
        viewConfig: {
            plugins: {
                ptype: 'gridviewdragdrop',
                dragText: 'Drag and drop to reorganize'
            }
        },
        height: 200,
        width: 400,
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
